00034 class LogListViewItem : public QTreeWidgetItem
00035 {
00036 public:
00037         LogListViewItem(QTreeWidgetItem * pPar, LogFile::Type eType, LogFile * pLog);
00038         LogListViewItem(QTreeWidget * pPar, LogFile::Type eType, LogFile * pLog);
00039         ~LogListViewItem(){};
00040 public:
00041         LogFile::Type   m_eType;
00042         LogFile       * m_pFileData;
00043 public:
00044         LogFile * log(){ return m_pFileData; };

00063 class LogListViewLog : public LogListViewItem
00064 {
00065 public:
00066         LogListViewLog(QTreeWidgetItem * pPar, LogFile::Type eType, LogFile * pLog);
00067         ~LogListViewLog(){};
00068         virtual QString fileName() const { return m_pFileData->fileName(); };
00069 protected:
00070         bool operator<(const QTreeWidgetItem & other) const
00071         {
00072                 return m_pFileData->date() < ((LogListViewLog *)&other)->m_pFileData->date();
00073         }
00074 };
